member.name: M:NasAPI.Controllers.API.ContactController.Post(NasAPI.Models.Contact)
member.summary: Post Contact to CRM.
member.remarks: Register new Contact in Portal DB >> then add the contact to CRM it will search by mobile phone in CRM then if exists, it returns the object with the GUID or if not exists, Add to CRM DB
member.returns: the Same Contact Object with GUID
member.response: code:200 the Same Contact Object with GUID
